meta.title: Listing Logs
meta.description: You can view the logs of your listing using this page.
meta.keywords: listing, logs, listing logs, view listing logs

meta.title: Listing Detail
meta.description: You can view the details of your listing using this page.
meta.keywords: listing, detail, listing detail, view listing detail

meta.title: Create Listing
meta.description: You can create a new listing using this page.
meta.keywords: listing, create, new, new listing, create listing

create.success: Your listing has been created successfully. If no problems are detected after the category checks are completed, it will be published.

meta.title: Edit Listing
meta.description: You can edit your listing using this page.
meta.keywords: listing, edit, edit listing, update, update listing

edit.success: Your listing has been updated successfully. If no problems are detected after the category checks are completed, it will be published.

meta.title: My Listings
meta.description: You can manage your listings using this page.
meta.keywords: my listings, manage my listings, view my listings

info.title: Listing Sorting
info.description: You can sort your listings by dragging and dropping them.

empty.title: Listing Not Found
empty.description: You have not created any listings yet. Click the create listing button above to create a new listing.

love.title: Autosaved Data Found
love.description: Auto-saved data was found for this listing. Would you like to upload this data?

verificationFailed.title: Not Verified
verificationFailed.description: An error occurred while validating your listing. Please contact your representative to review the details.

onLive.title: On Live
onLive.description: Your listing is now publicly available.

deleted.title: Deleted
deleted.description: Deleted listing. To republish, go to the detail page.

active.title: Active
active.description: Your listing is active and ready to be published.

passive.title: Disabled
passive.description: Your listing is disabled and not ready to be published.

meta.title: Meta Information
meta.subtitle: In this section, you can enter the meta information of your listing.

images.title: Listing Images
images.subtitle: In this section, you can upload images of your listing.

error.title: Title Required
error.description: To upload an image, you must enter a title of at least 5 characters.

calendar.title: Calendar & Pricing
calendar.subtitle: In this section, you can determine the calendar and pricing of your listing.

info.title: Price Range Tip
info.description: You can set different prices for specific date ranges using the fields below.
info.example: For example, between June 1 - June 30, it is 100 ₺, and between July 1 - July 31, it is 200 ₺.
info.float: Use dots for decimal numbers. For example, $100.50.

error.startDateGreaterThanEndDate: Start date cannot be greater than end date.
error.endDateLessThanNow: The end date cannot be less than the current date.
error.startDateLessThanNow: The start date cannot be less than the current date.
error.unique: At least one of the days in this date range has already been added.
error.priceNaN: The price field is incorrect. This field should be like this: 10,000 (ten thousand ₺) or 10,000.50 (ten thousand ₺ 50 kr).
error.priceNegative: The price field cannot be negative.

category.title: Category Information
category.subtitle: In this section, you can enter the category information of your listing.

category-alerts.title: Category Warnings
category-alerts.subtitle: In this section, you can enter the category warnings of your listing.

category-rules.title: Category Rules
category-rules.subtitle: Please read and accept the category rules.

location.title: Listing Location
location.subtitle: In this section you can determine the location of your listing.

isStrict.title: Exact Location
isStrict.description: Is the location of this listing certain?

location.error: Location selection failed. Please try again.
location.notSupported: Your browser does not support location selection.

info.title: Map Tip
info.description: Click to select a location on the map. The blue pointer shows the location. Drag the pointer to change the location.
info.descriptionTwo: Note: City and County are changed using estimated location information. If it is incorrect, you can change the city and county information manually.

validation.title: Special Rules
validation.subtitle: In this section, you can enter the special rules of your listing.

onlyFamily.title: Families Only
onlyFamily.description: This listing is for families only. Non-family members cannot reserve this listing.

noPet.title: No Pets
noPet.description: This listing does not accept pets.

noSmoke.title: Smoking is Prohibited
noSmoke.description: People who book this listing cannot smoke during the booking period.

noAlcohol.title: Alcohol is Prohibited
noAlcohol.description: People who reserve this listing cannot consume alcohol during the reservation period.

noParty.title: Party Forbidden
noParty.description: People who book this listing cannot organize a party here.

noUnmarried.title: Unmarried Persons Prohibited
noUnmarried.description: People who book this listing must be married.

noGuest.title: Guests Forbidden
noGuest.description: People who reserve this listing cannot accept guests.
